attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So you would have to be 17 to;

*Drive a motor vechil.
*Purchase and drink alcohol.
*Purchase and smaoke ciggerettes.
*17 not 18 certificate at the cinema.
*Purchase and participate in pornogrophy.
*17 the sex age divide, no one above the age of 17 can have sex with some one below the age of 17 (hertosexual and homosexual).
*Voting.
*Marridge.
*Join the army.
*Adult prison.
Arguments: British culture is more relaxed with younger ages and with 16 year olds leaving school this would give them more freedom and a organized lifestyle so there wont be farfetched ages such as driving at 17 but drinking at 18.
